entity.attribute: To Sikhw Desert. No access.

point-of-interest.name: Fado Great Caves 1
point-of-interest.title: Fado Great Caves
point-of-interest.description: Entrance to Fado Great Caves, a huge dungeon that extends over a wide underground area south of Orril river.

entity.attribute: Friends, welcome to Kalavan City.
transparent
Enemies, beware!
transparent
Kalavan City, twinned with Deniran.
transparent
You see a hot grill, for fish, meat or ham.
You see a barbecue, and wonder where the cook is.
You see a barbecue, ready to grill some fish. Careful, it will be hot!
You see a barbecue for grilling meat, just try not to burn it.
Dear Mr Postman, please leave my mail under the mat, as birds are nesting in this mailbox.
